DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study help answer LY2127399 safe effective treatment rheumatoid arthritis patient inadequate response one Tumor necrosis factor-alpha ( TNF α ) inhibitor . This study comprise 2 period : Period 1 - 24 week blind treatment Period 2 - 48 week post treatment follow
DOC.brief_title: A Study Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA ) 6 month le 15 year At least 8 tender swollen joint An abnormally high Creactive protein ( CRP ) level erythrocyte sedimentation rate ( ESR ) Positive Rheumatoid Factor ( RF ) Anticyclic citrullinated peptide ( CCP ) antibody Previously treat biologic TNFα inhibitor therapy ( infliximab , certolizumab , golimumab , etanercept , adalimumab ) stop treatment due insufficient efficacy intolerance Regular use least one conventional diseasemodifying antirheumatic drug ( DMARD ) , stable dose least 8 week prior study start Woman must pregnant , breastfeeding , become pregnant study Use unstable dos nonsteroidal inflammatory drug ( NSAIDS ) past 6 week Steroid injection intravenous ( IV ) infusion last 6 week Use 10 mg/day oral steroid last 6 week History serious reaction biological DMARDs Use oral calcineurin inhibitor ( e.g. , cyclosporin tacrolimus ) last 8 week Surgery joint major surgery le 2 month ago , plan joint surgery major surgery study Active fibromyalgia , juvenile chronic arthritis , spondyloarthropathy , Crohn 's disease , ulcerative colitis , psoriatic arthritis , systemic inflammatory condition except RA Cervical cancer squamous skin cancer within past 3 year , cancer within past 5 year Received live vaccine receive within past 12 week ( example , vaccine measles , mumps , rubella , chicken pox , nasalspray flu vaccine ) Hepatitis human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) A serious bacterial infection ( example , pneumonia cellulitis ) within 3 month serious bone joint infection within 6 month Symptoms herpes zoster herpes simplex within last month Active latent tuberculosis ( TB ) Current symptoms serious disorder illness Use investigational drug within last month
